```{r}
library(dplyr)

```


### Data cleaning
```{r}
df <- NHANES |>
  filter(Gender == "male") |>
  select(Testosterone, Age, 
         BPSysAve, BPDiaAve, Pulse, TotChol,    # cardio
         BMI,                                   # body composition               
         UrineFlow1,                            # urine
         Diabetes, PhysActive                   # general health
         ) |>
  distinct() |>
  drop_na() |>
  mutate(Diabetes = factor(Diabetes))
```


### Model
```{r}
model <- lm(Testosterone ~ Age + BPSysAve + BPDiaAve + Pulse + TotChol + BMI + UrineFlow1 + Diabetes + PhysActive, data = final_data)
summary(corrected_model)
```
